info.description:
A comprehensive WhatsApp Business API built with Go, following Clean Architecture principles.
Provides endpoints for session management, messaging, contacts, groups, media handling, and integrations.
info.title: zpwoot WhatsApp API

get.description: Get basic information about the service
Check if the service and database are healthy
Retrieves a list of all WhatsApp sessions with their current status (without QR codes)

post.description: Creates a new WhatsApp session with the specified configuration

400.description: Invalid request body or validation error

get.description: Retrieves detailed information about a specific WhatsApp session (without QR code)

delete.description: Permanently deletes a WhatsApp session and all associated data

post.description: Connects a WhatsApp session. If already connected, returns current status with appropriate message.

200.description: Session connected successfully or already connected

get.description: List all contacts from the WhatsApp account

post.description: Get profile picture of a WhatsApp user
Verify if phone numbers are registered on WhatsApp
post.summary: Check if users are on WhatsApp

post.description: Get detailed information about a WhatsApp user
Disconnects an active WhatsApp session temporarily. If already disconnected, returns current status with appropriate message.

200.description: Session disconnected successfully or already disconnected

get.description: List all groups the session is part of

post.description: Create a new WhatsApp group

get.description: Get detailed information about a specific group

post.description: Get group information from invite code without joining

get.description: Get or reset the invite link for a group

post.description: Join a group using invite code
Leave a WhatsApp group
Change the name of a group
Add, remove, promote or demote group participants
Set the photo of a group (JPEG format required)

delete.description: Remove the photo of a group

post.description: Enable or disable announce mode (only admins can send messages when enabled)
Configure disappearing messages timer (24h, 7d, 90d, or off)
Lock or unlock group settings (only admins can edit when locked)
Change the description/topic of a group
Logs out a WhatsApp session permanently. Unlinks device from WhatsApp. Requires QR scan to reconnect.
Delete a sent message
Edit a sent message
Request synchronization of message history
Mark one or more messages as read

Send an audio message to a WhatsApp contact. Supports Base64, URL, or file path. Supports reply/quote using contextInfo. Set viewOnce to true to send as a view-once message that disappears after being viewed.

400.description: Invalid request or media processing error

post.description: Send a buttons message to a WhatsApp contact (Not yet implemented)
Send a single contact card to a WhatsApp contact. VCard is auto-generated if not provided. Supports reply/quote using contextInfo.
Send multiple contacts in a single message using ContactsArrayMessage. All contacts are sent in one message, not as separate messages. VCard is auto-generated for each contact if not provided.
Send a document message to a WhatsApp contact. Supports Base64, URL, or file path. Supports reply/quote using contextInfo.

400.description: Invalid request or media processing error

post.description: Send an image message to a WhatsApp contact with optional caption. Supports Base64, URL, or file path. Supports reply/quote using contextInfo. Set viewOnce to true to send as a view-once message that disappears after being viewed.

400.description: Invalid request or media processing error

post.description: Send a list message to a WhatsApp contact (Not yet implemented)
Send a location message to a WhatsApp contact with latitude, longitude, and optional name/address. Supports reply/quote using contextInfo.
Send a poll message to a WhatsApp contact with multiple options. Supports single or multiple selection.
Send a reaction (emoji) to a specific message. Use empty string to remove reaction.
Send a sticker message to a WhatsApp contact. Supports Base64, URL, or file path. Image will be converted to WebP format.

400.description: Invalid request or media processing error

post.description: Send a template message to a WhatsApp contact (Not yet implemented)
Send a simple text message to a WhatsApp contact. Supports reply/quote using contextInfo.

Send a video message to a WhatsApp contact with optional caption. Supports Base64, URL, or file path. Supports reply/quote using contextInfo. Set viewOnce to true to send as a view-once message that disappears after being viewed.

400.description: Invalid request or media processing error

post.description: Pair a phone number without QR code
Send presence in specific chat (typing/recording)
Send general presence status (available/unavailable)

get.description: Retrieves the QR code for WhatsApp session authentication. Scan with WhatsApp mobile app.
Get webhook configuration for a session

post.description: Configure or update webhook for a session

delete.description: Delete webhook configuration for a session

get.description: List all available webhook event types

vcard.example:
BEGIN:VCARD
VERSION:3.0
FN:John Doe
TEL:+5511999999999
END:VCARD

events.description: Se vazio, aceita todos os eventos

status.example: Hey there! I am using WhatsApp.

address.example: Av. Paulista, 1578 - Bela Vista, São Paulo - SP

content.example: Hello! This is a test message.

contacts.description: Array of contacts sent in a single message

fromMe.description:
FromMe indicates if the message being reacted to was sent by us
Can be set explicitly or by using "me:" prefix in MessageID
Example: "me:3EB0C767D0D1A6F4FD29" or set FromMe: true

text.example: Hello! This is a test message from zpwoot API.

ApiKeyAuth.description: API key for authentication. Use the value from .env file (API_KEY variable). Send as 'Authorization: your-api-key' (without Bearer prefix)
ApiKeyAuth.name: Authorization
